raw_data.raw_string: From 1 October 2017 to 31 January 2019, senior adviser to the African Development Bank, Avenue Lamblin, Abidjan, Cote d'Ivoire. I expect to devote 5 days a year to this role. I have waived the fee and will receive a nominal payment of £1. (Registered 09 October 2017)
